name: Paper Flipper!
description:
<<PAPER FLIPPER>>

Welcome to Paper Flipper! A paper / Cardboard themed 2D Puzzle Platformer made for the BenBonk Game Jam #3!! 

You go through the stages by flipping the stages themselves, and showing the hidden content on the other side of the page.

The theme for this jam was "Two sides"

Controls: 

[A] and [D] to move sideways

[Spacebar] or [W] to jump

[Left Mouse Button] to flip the pages

CREDITS:

This game was made by @Pixelipy and @TriangleDev
